articles.title: American Football: "Leidenschaftlich": Mahomes plant Deutschland-Rückkehr
articles.description: Hier finden Sie Informationen zu dem Thema „American Football“. Lesen Sie jetzt „"Leidenschaftlich": Mahomes plant Deutschland-Rückkehr“.
articles.content: Football-Superstar Patrick Mahomes kann sich nach der NFL-Premiere von Frankfurt eine baldige Rückkehr nach Deutschland bestens vorstellen. «Die Fans waren laut und leidenschaftlich. Sie verstehen da… [+1811 chars]

articles.author: Dominik Rosing
articles.title: Nach NFL-Sieg in Frankfurt geben Chiefs-Stars deutschen Fans größtmögliches Lob
articles.description: Angeführt von Patrick Mahomes untermauern die Kansas City Chiefs in Frankfurt ihre Super-Bowl-Ambitionen. Gegen den Titel-Herausforderer Miami Dolphins feiern die Chiefs einen wichtigen Sieg - und danach die leidenschaftlichen Football-Fans in Deutschland.

articles.title: Footballer Díaz begs father's ELN kidnappers to free him
articles.description: Colombian-born Liverpool footballer Luis Díaz begs for his father's kidnappers to free him immediately.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'I get called fat all the time' – Fran Kirby opens up on 'stigma' for women in football
articles.description: The Chelsea and England midfielder has spoken about body image and injury issues in the women’s game after an eight-month lay-off
articles.content:

articles.author: MICHAEL R. SISAK and ERIC TUCKER
articles.title: Trump's decades of testimony provide some clues about how he'll fight for his real estate empire
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Donald Trump has testified in court as a football owner, casino builder and airline buyer. He bragged in a deposition that he saved “millions of lives” by deterring nuclear war as president.
